text:
@SenateGOP @senatemajldr In the EU we see what opening during COVID19 does.

COVID19 only needs ONE person to interact and create exponentially many more cases.

We have a safe digital way to keep people safe from being infected.
If you want to fund economy, get people to work online as much as possible.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
